name: Omega-3 (High-Dose EPA)
description: High-dose EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) focused omega-3 for cardiovascular and anti-inflammatory benefits beyond standard fish oil. Icosapent ethyl (Vascepa) is the prescription form. Higher EPA:DHA ratio appears more cardioprotective than balanced formulations.

dosage.notes: EPA-focused (3:1 or higher EPA:DHA ratio). Vascepa (icosapent ethyl) is purified EPA â€” Rx. OTC options: concentrated EPA fish oil. Take with fatty meals for absorption.

Omega-3 index >8% associated with 5 years greater life expectancy
